en.title: Height Calculator
en.seoTitle: Height Calculator - How Tall Will My Child Be?
en.metaDescription: Free height calculator to predict your child's adult height based on parent heights. Uses the mid-parent method for accurate prediction.
en.description: Predict your child's potential adult height based on parent heights.

seoContent.introduction: Our Height Calculator helps parents predict their child's potential adult height using the scientifically-backed mid-parent method.

benefits.title: Scientific Method
benefits.description: Uses the proven mid-parent height calculation

benefits.title: Gender-Specific
benefits.description: Accounts for height differences between genders

seoContent.formulaExplanation: Mid-parent method: For boys: (Father + Mother + 13cm) / 2. For girls: (Father + Mother - 13cm) / 2.
seoContent.whoItsFor: Parents curious about their child's potential adult height.
seoContent.disclaimer: This calculator provides estimates. Actual height depends on nutrition, health, and genetics.

faqs.question: How accurate is this?
faqs.answer: The mid-parent method is accurate within ¬±10cm for 95% of children.

faqs.question: What factors affect height?
faqs.answer: Genetics (60-80%), nutrition, sleep, exercise, and health.
